title: Free RP giveaway event?
body:
Im pretty sure I have bonus RP in my account now that wasn't there yesterday,

I had 1600ish so I knew I could get the new Azir skin even if for some reason it didn't go on sale, I then put in a $10 card to buy one of the bundles that was 1000ish I then had 1800ish leftover, I know because I made a joke last night to my friend about wanting the bard chroma pack but if I got it I wouldn't have enough for the Azir skin,
And now today I have 3800, and im pretty sure I didn't put any in.

Just wondering if there was some sort of good behaviour or Christmas giveaway thing that might have caused it, if there wasn't then it must have been me and I just don't remember buying it I guess.

replies.body: shh stop complaining i know a guy who got 30 000 free rp
I remember posting that image around many times a while back, those were the days

Holy shit haha xD
Nah I'm not complaining, I just don't want to spend it and then riot comes in and says "sorry we made a mistake so we will take away all the legacy snowdown skins you bought with it, and now you have to wait till next year to buy them again. Sorry for the inconvenience,"
